title: innum En murugA enpAl
sahitya:
innum En murugA enpAl irangavillai innalurum ennai inbura sheyya nI


anupallavi

  cenni malai shErndun sEvaDi sEvikkum anbar innal tIra aruLai vArit-taruvOnE


caraNam    IrAru vizhigaLil Ivirakka vAri peruga IrAru koDaikkaram sOrAdaruL mAri soriya
tIrAt-tolvinai yAvum tIra naTruNaiyAgum pErAdaravai iniyEnum pera vENum eLiyEnum
